content: Late checkout is available upon request at all locations, but it is not guaranteed and depends on same day occupancy. Fang Club Elder tier members receive priority consideration when requesting late checkout.
Early check in requests are handled on a first come basis on the day of arrival. While we cannot guarantee early access, luggage storage and access to common areas are always available.
Smoking is not permitted in guestrooms or indoor public spaces, including magical smoke and potion fumes. Designated outdoor smoking areas are available and clearly marked at each property.

If a guest accidentally triggers supernatural activity such as levitation or wall crawling, please notify the front desk immediately. Our maintenance team is trained to reset enchanted fixtures safely.
All locations comply with modern accessibility standards while preserving historic charm. Wheelchair accessible rooms, elevators, and bathrooms are available upon request.

Guests who require total darkness during daytime hours may request blackout sealing, including door light blockers and window edge covers. This service is complimentary and typically installed within 20 minutes.
Laundry and dry cleaning services are available at all locations, including special care for capes, cloaks, and enchanted fabrics. Same day service is offered when items are submitted before 9:00 AM.
If you lose a personal item during your stay, contact the front desk or corporate support as soon as possible. Lost items are logged and stored securely for up to 30 days.
Room service is available late night at all properties, with limited overnight menus between 2:00 AM and 6:00 AM. Beverage service remains available 24 hours for registered guests.
Mini bars are stocked with blood substitutes, mineral water, and regionally inspired snacks. If you prefer a custom mini bar setup, request it at least 24 hours before arrival.
For guest safety, windows are sealed beyond a certain opening limit. Flying guests may request supervised rooftop access where permitted by local regulations.
All emergency exits are clearly marked and enchanted to remain visible in darkness, smoke, or magical fog. In case of evacuation, follow illuminated claw print indicators along the floor.
Guests are responsible for supervising their pets at all times, including in elevators and public spaces. Repeated aggressive behavior may result in relocation to a pet friendly isolation wing.
Currency exchange services are available for major world currencies and select ancient forms of payment. Exchange rates are posted daily at the front desk.
If you are celebrating a birthday, rebirth, or full moon milestone, notify the front desk and we can arrange a small in room surprise. Advance notice is recommended for custom requests.
San Francisco offers complimentary fog resistant umbrellas at the front desk on a first come basis. These are ideal for evening walks near the waterfront.
Guests attending tech conferences downtown often request high speed WiFi upgrades in San Francisco. These upgrades can be added per day or per stay.
The San Francisco lobby lounge offers a nightly fog hour from 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM, featuring ambient lighting and low volume music. It is designed for relaxed socializing.
If you are sensitive to coastal humidity, dehumidifiers are available upon request in San Francisco rooms. Availability is limited during peak fog season.
San Francisco Family Crypts can be configured with partial partitions for privacy between adults and children. Ask housekeeping if you want this adjustment after check in.
New York guests frequently ask about luggage storage on departure day, which is available free of charge until midnight. After midnight storage can be arranged for a small fee.
If you are attending a late Broadway show, New York can delay housekeeping service until afternoon upon request. This is helpful for guests who sleep later in the morning.
New York soundproofing is tested nightly, but if you hear unexpected noise, call the front desk and we will investigate immediately. White noise devices are also available.
Central Park midnight runs are most popular between 11:00 PM and 1:00 AM. Concierge can advise on the safest and least crowded paths based on the season.
For Fang Club members, New York occasionally offers double points promotions during off peak weekdays. These promotions are announced by email and at check in.
Chicago guests often take advantage of free parking for longer stays, especially during winter. Snow clearing is handled by hotel staff, so you do not need to move your vehicle.
Windy City Suites in Chicago are designed with reinforced windows to reduce wind noise. If you are sensitive to drafts, request one of these rooms when booking.
During colder months, Chicago offers complimentary hot beverages in the lobby from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM. All options are clearly labeled for garlic and silver sensitivity.
If you are visiting for a sports event, the Chicago front desk can help plan transportation that avoids peak crowds. This is especially useful during downtown game nights.
Full Moon Howl a thon dates are posted in the lobby and sent via in room messaging. Guests who prefer not to participate can request alternate activity suggestions.
